page.title: 11THE GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: All around Stockton on Forest are small holdings where in the summer people can pick their own strawberries raspberries,potatoes,blackcurrants and gooseberries. The main place to buy these though is Dean's Garden Centre.The workers at Deans have the jobs of looking after the plants,displaying the plants,unloading and loading,cleaning up and working at the till. They employ 11 fulltime workers and 5 partime workers.It opened in December 1968.The firm will get alot bigger in the future.The busiest day of the week is Sunday and the busiest time of the year is between March and June.
